rooms.description: A spacious living and dining area designed for social gatherings. Incorporates modern design elements with large windows to allow natural light.
Includes an en-suite bathroom and a walk-in closet. Positioned in the south-west for calm energy according to Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen design with an integrated breakfast nook. Open plan layout aligns with current trends and promotes a sociable environment.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance ensuring balance of positive energy.
Ensures ease of movement between floors and accommodates mobility of servants' quarters.
